name: LOVE KILLS
description:
LOVE KILLS is a romantic comedy dating simulator that follows a down-on-his-luck assassin named Aven Slate as he struggles to kill his target and unexpectedly finds love along the way!

Aven lives at the edges of Loc, a pneumatic tube-based city . Working as an assassin hasn’t brought Aven the money he hoped for, but he receives a mysterious call that there’s a bounty out for the seduction and assassination of Dallon Anand, a simple post office worker. Figuring this will be an easy enough job, Aven heads out with the intention to date and kill Dallon—until he realizes that there's another assassin trying to do the exact same thing!

Date your target—or your rival! Win the favor of your chosen paramour! And maybe do some murder?

This version of LOVE KILLS is a fully-realized preview that features two dateable characters and seven possible endings.
